description:
Preset adjustments in photoshop for photography.

Sometimes we dive right in and look to learn the really hard stuff in photoshop. We overlook the simple stuff that is preset for us. In this course we professionals will take a step back to see shat is preset and ready to go for us.

In this course you will learn how to use the basic settings to make your photos pop with authority. You will have a workflow that is effortless and make you look like a pro within a few clicks in very little time.

You will will be able to get through this course in no time and be on your way to showing off your awesome photos right after you finish this course.

The things that keep is from good to great is the simple stuff. Look at this as a refresher or a new beginning to improving yourself. This is a very completive game, don't let the easiest things effect your day performance.
title: The Power of presets in Photoshop
